description: Enterprise techniques used by ZIPLINE, ATT&CK software S1114 (v1.1)
name: ZIPLINE (S1114)

techniques.comment: [ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can use `/bin/sh` to create a reverse shell and execute commands.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)
[ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can use AES-128-CBC to encrypt data for both upload and download.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)
[ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can find and append specific files on Ivanti Connect Secure VPNs based upon received commands.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)

[ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can add itself to the exclusion list for the Ivanti Connect Secure Integrity Checker Tool if the `--exclude` parameter is passed by the `tar` process.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)

[ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can download files to be saved on the compromised system.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)
[ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can communicate with C2 using a custom binary protocol.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)
[ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can identify running processes and their names.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)
[ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can create a proxy server on compromised hosts.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)

[ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can identify a specific string in intercepted network traffic, `SSH-2.0-OpenSSH_0.3xx.`, to trigger its command functionality.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)
